Name: Lavender WL
SeedDescription: Grows in spring in 8 days. One bush gives several lavender flowers.

SeedDescriptionLocalization.pt: Cresce na Primavera em 8 dias. Um arbusto dá várias flores de lavanda.
SeedDescriptionLocalization.ru: Растет весной за 8 дней. Один кустик дает несколько лавандовых цветков.
SeedDescriptionLocalization.zh: 在春季8天内生长。一丛就能开出几朵淡紫色的花。
